name: Test Game (Archivess)
description:
Hello! This is my first complete game, which is serving as a test for uploading games to Itch.io! This game is very short, with a gameplay time of maybe 5 minutes. It is mostly intended for just my close friends to play. If you happen upon this game, feel free to try it out if you please! 

Controls:

D - Rotate right

A - Rotate left

Space - Thrust forward

Escape - Close Application
